Package org.lgdcloudsim.request

package org.lgdcloudsim.request
  • Class
    Description
    Instance
    Instances run on the host, and each instance occupies the host's resources, including CPU, memory, storage, and bandwidth.
    InstanceGroup
    InstanceGroup is a group of instances that are scheduled to run on the same datacenter.
    InstanceGroupEdge
    An interface representing the edges of a connection between groups of instances.
    InstanceGroupEdgeSimple
    InstanceGroupEdgeSimple is a simple implementation of the InstanceGroupEdge interface.
    InstanceGroupGraph
    Each user request has a InstanceGroupGraph, which represents the relationship between instance groups.
    InstanceGroupGraphSimple
    InstanceGroupGraphSimple is a simple implementation of the InstanceGroupGraph interface.
    InstanceGroupSimple
    InstanceGroupSimple is a simple implementation of the InstanceGroup interface.
    InstanceSimple
    InstanceSimple is a simple implementation of the Instance interface.
    RandomUserRequestGenerator
    A simple user request generator to randomly generate a user request.
    RequestEntity
    Instance, InstanceGroup and InstanceGroupGraph in user requests all need to extend this interface.
    UserRequest
    UserRequest is the interface for user requests.
    UserRequestGenerator
    A simple user request generator to generate a user request.
    UserRequestSimple
    UserRequestSimple is a simple implementation of the UserRequest interface.
